newspaper.Name: Rick
newspaper.Text: Local Woman Dies in Tragic Accident

newspaper.Name: Rick
newspaper.Text: The community is mourning the loss of a beloved member after a tragic accident claimed her life yesterday.

newspaper.Name: Rick
newspaper.Text: According to reports, 45-year-old Edwarda was involved in a crime.

computer.Name: Rick
computer.Text: I see her WhatsCapy is opened. I wonder why.

computer.Name: Martin
computer.Text: Did your husband leave? I want you, Vanessa.

computer.Name: Martin
computer.Text: We will be so rich after he will be arrested.

computer.Name: Rick
computer.Text: Me?! Arrested? What did I do?

computer.Name: Ernesta
computer.Text: Rick! Come to your sister's apartmanet
